message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $100.  It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay $90 for the product. Looking forward to your response!
Bob, I appreciate your offer.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $95.  This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident you'll find the product worthwhile. Let me know what you think!
